PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-16742000-11-090,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
PrecisGranting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to the Hon. Mr. Justice WILLIAM A. ESSON, a Justice of Appeal of the The Court of Appeal for British Columbia, for a period of two years, in order to allow him to serve on the Inquiry into the events that occurred at Londonderry, Northern Ireland, on January 30, 1972.
Attachments
